## Description | 问题描述

A clear description of the bug.

## Steps to Reproduce | 复现步骤

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior | 期望行为

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior | 实际行为

What actually happened.

## Screenshots | 截图

If applicable, add screenshots.

## Environment | 环境信息

- Browser: [e.g. Chrome 120]
- OS: [e.g. macOS 14]
- Node: [e.g. 20.x]
